segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing at the sink doesn't seem to notice the water at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that she's not paying attention to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being so mischievous, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks like he's about to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will catch him if he does fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside the window looks so calm and tidy compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much is happening in this kitchen without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor looks so slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans that up soon before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink seems completely absorbed in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice the water or the children's mischief anytime soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
